00052 // For example: U_MACROSERVER(UServerExample, UClientExample, UTCPSocket);
00053 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00054 #ifdef DEBUG
00055 #  define U_MACROSERVER(server_class,client_class,type_socket) \
00056 class server_class : public UServer<type_socket> { \
00057 public: \
00058  server_class(UFileConfig* cfg) : UServer<type_socket>(cfg) { U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(  5, server_class, "%p", cfg) } \
00059 ~server_class()                                                                                                                 { U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(5, server_class) } \
00060 const char* dump(bool reset) const { return UServer<type_socket>::dump(reset); } \
00061 protected: \
00062 virtual void newClientImage() { \
00063 U_TRACE(5, #server_class "::newClientImage()") \
00064 (void) U_NEW(client_class()); } }
00065 #else
00066 #  define U_MACROSERVER(server_class,client_class,type_socket) \
00067 class server_class : public UServer<type_socket> { \
00068 public: \
00069  server_class(UFileConfig* cfg) : UServer<type_socket>(cfg) {} \
00070 ~server_class()                                                                                                                 {} \
00071 protected: \
00072 virtual void newClientImage() { (void) new client_class(); } }
00073 #endif

00076 // manage write to log server
00077 
00078 #define U_SRV_LOG_VAR(                    fmt,args...)  { if (UServer_Base::isLog()) ULog::log("%s"fmt"\n",      UServer_Base::mod_name, args); }
00079 #define U_SRV_LOG_VAR_WITH_ADDR(fmt,args...)    { if (UServer_Base::isLog()) ULog::log("%s"fmt" %.*s\n", UServer_Base::mod_name, args, \
00080                                                                                                                                                                                                                          U_STRING_TO_TRACE(*(UClientImage_Base::pClientImage->logbuf))); }
00081 
00082 #define U_SRV_LOG_MSG(                    msg) U_SRV_LOG_VAR("%s",                              (msg))
00083 #define U_SRV_LOG_MSG_WITH_ADDR(msg) U_SRV_LOG_VAR_WITH_ADDR("%s",(msg))
00084 
00085 #define U_SRV_LOG_TIMEOUT(cimg)          U_SRV_LOG_VAR("client connected didn't send any request in %u secs (timeout), close connection %.*s", \
00086                                                                                                                                                 UServer_Base::getReqTimeout(), U_STRING_TO_TRACE(*((cimg)->logbuf)))

00092 class U_EXPORT UServer_Base : public UEventFd {
00093 public:
00094 
00095         // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00096         // UServer - configuration parameters
00097         // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00098         // USE_IPV6      flag indicating the use of ipv6
00099         // SERVER        host name or ip address for the listening socket
00100         // PORT          port number                              for the listening socket
00101         // SOCKET_NAME   file name                                        for the listening socket
00102         // IP_ADDRESS    public ip address of host for the interface connected to the Internet (autodetected if not specified)
00103         // ALLOWED_IP     list of comma separated client address for IP-based access control (IPADDR[/MASK])
00104         //
00105         // USE_TCP_OPTIMIZATION flag indicating the use of TCP/IP options to optimize data transmission (TCP_CORK, TCP_DEFER_ACCEPT, TCP_QUICKACK)
00106         //
00107         // PID_FILE      write pid on file indicated
00108         // WELCOME_MSG   message of welcome to send initially to client
00109         // RUN_AS_USER   downgrade the security to that of user account
00110         // DOCUMENT_ROOT The directory out of which you will serve your documents
00111         //
00112         // LOG_FILE      locations for file log
00113         // LOG_FILE_SZ   memory size for file log
00114         // LOG_MSG_SIZE  limit length of print network message to LOG_MSG_SIZE chars (default 128)
00115         //
00116         // PLUGIN                 list of plugins to load, a flexible way to add specific functionality to the server
00117         // PLUGIN_DIR     directory of plugins to load
00118         //
00119         // REQ_TIMEOUT    timeout for request from client
00120         // CGI_TIMEOUT    timeout for cgi execution
00121         //
00122         // MAX_KEEP_ALIVE Specifies the maximum number of requests that can be served through a Keep-Alive (Persistent) session.
00123         //                                              (Value <= 1 will disable Keep-Alive)
00124         //
00125         // CERT_FILE     server certificate
00126         // KEY_FILE      server private key
00127         // PASSWORD      password for server private key
00128         // CA_FILE       locations of trusted CA certificates used in the verification
00129         // CA_PATH       locations of trusted CA certificates used in the verification
00130         // VERIFY_MODE   mode of verification (SSL_VERIFY_NONE=0, SSL_VERIFY_PEER=1, SSL_VERIFY_FAIL_IF_NO_PEER_CERT=2, SSL_VERIFY_CLIENT_ONCE=4)
00131         //
00132         // PREFORK_CHILD number of child server processes created at startup ( 0 - serialize, no forking
00133         //                                                                     1 - classic, forking after client accept
00134         //                                                                    >1 - pool of serialized processes plus monitoring process)
00135         // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00136

00203         static bool isFileInsideDocumentRoot(const UString& path)
00204                 {
00205                 U_TRACE(0, "UServer_Base::isFileInsideDocumentRoot(%.*S)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(path))
00206 
00207                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(pthis)
00208 
00209                 bool result = (path.size() >= pthis->document_root.size());
00210 
00211                 U_RETURN(result);
00212                 }

00234         // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00235         // Manage process server
00236         // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00237         // PREFORK_CHILD number of child server processes created at startup ( 0 - serialize, no forking
00238         //                                                                     1 - classic, forking after client accept
00239         //                                                                    >1 - pool of serialized processes plus monitoring process)
00240         // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00241 
00242         typedef struct shared_data {
00243                 int socket_flags;                               // socket accept descriptor flags from fcntl(fd, F_GETFL, 0)
00244                 int tot_connection;
00245         } shared_data;
00246 
00247         static ULock* lock;
00248         static shared_data* ptr;
00249         static int preforked_num_kids; // keeping a pool of children and that they accept connections themselves
00250 
00251         static bool isPreForked()
00252                 {
00253                 U_TRACE(0, "UServer_Base::isPreForked()")
00254 
00255                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("preforked_num_kids = %d", preforked_num_kids)
00256 
00257                 bool result = (preforked_num_kids > 1);
00258 
00259                 U_RETURN(result);
00260                 }
00261 
00262         static bool isClassic()
00263                 {
00264                 U_TRACE(0, "UServer_Base::isClassic()")
00265 
00266                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("preforked_num_kids = %d", preforked_num_kids)
00267 
00268                 bool result = (preforked_num_kids == 1);
00269 
00270                 U_RETURN(result);
00271                 }
00272 
00273         static bool isSerialize() { return (isClassic() == false); }
00274 
00275         static void setProcessManager()
00276                 {
00277                 U_TRACE(0, "UServer_Base::setProcessManager()")
00278 
00279                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(proc,0)
00280 
00281                 proc = U_NEW(UProcess);
00282 
00283                 proc->setProcessGroup();
00284                 }
00285 
00286         static bool isParent()
00287                 {
00288                 U_TRACE(0, "UServer_Base::isParent()")
00289 
00290                 bool result = (proc && proc->parent());
00291 
00292                 U_RETURN(result);
00293                 }
00294 
00295         static bool isChild()
00296                 {
00297                 U_TRACE(0, "UServer_Base::isChild()")
00298 
00299                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(proc)
00300 
00301                 bool result = (proc->child());
00302 
00303                 U_RETURN(result);
00304                 }
00305 
00306         static void sendSigTERM()
00307                 {
00308                 U_TRACE(0, "UServer_Base::sendSigTERM()")
00309 
00310                 UProcess::kill(0, SIGTERM); // SIGTERM is sent to every process in the process group of the calling process...
00311                 }

00315         static ULog* log;
00316 
00317         static bool     isLog() { return (log != 0); }
00318 
00319         static void openLog(const UString& name, uint32_t size)
00320                 {
00321                 U_TRACE(0, "UServer_Base::openLog(%.*S,%u)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(name), size)
00322 
00323                 log = U_NEW(ULog(name, size));
00324 
00325                 if (preforked_num_kids) ULog::setServer(true);
00326                 else                                                    ULog::setClient();
00327                 }

00330         static UCommand* loadConfigCommand(UFileConfig& cfg, bool bset);

00332         static void getTimeIfNeeded()
00333                 {
00334                 U_TRACE(0, "UServer_Base::getTimeIfNeeded()")
00335 
00336                 if (UHTTP::http_info.version == 0 && (log == 0 || ULog::isSysLog())) (void) U_SYSCALL(gettimeofday, "%p,%p", &u_now, 0);
00337                 }

00339         // check if we can go to blocking on accept()...
00340 
00341         static bool isClientConnect()
00342                 {
00343                 U_TRACE(0, "UServer_Base::isClientConnect()")
00344 
00345                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("num_connection = %d", num_connection)
00346 
00347                 bool result = (isClassic() ? isChild()
00348                                                                                         : num_connection > 0);
00349 
00350                 U_RETURN(result);
00351                 }

00354 
00355         static bool isMaxKeepAlive()
00356                 {
00357                 U_TRACE(0, "UServer_Base::isMaxKeepAlive()")
00358 
00359                 bool result = (num_connection >= max_Keep_Alive);
00360 
00361                 U_RETURN(result);
00362                 }

00389         static void notifyForEventRequestConnection()
00390                 {
00391                 U_TRACE(0, "UServer_Base::notifyForEventRequestConnection()")
00392 
00393                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(pthis)
00394 
00395 #       ifndef HAVE_LIBEVENT
00396                 UNotifier::insert(pthis);
00397 #       else
00398                 pevent = U_NEW(UEvent<UServer_Base>(pthis->UEventFd::fd, EV_READ | EV_PERSIST, *pthis));
00399 
00400                 UDispatcher::add(*pevent);
00401 #       endif
00402                 }

00411         UString server,         // host name or ip address for the listening socket
00412                           as_user,              // change the current working directory to the user's home dir, and downgrade security to that user account
00413                           log_file,             // locations for file log
00414                           cert_file,    // locations for certificate of server
00415                           key_file,             // locations for private key of server
00416                           password,             // password for private key of server
00417                           ca_file,              // locations of trusted CA certificates used in the verification
00418                           ca_path,              // locations of trusted CA certificates used in the verification
00419                           allow_IP,             // Interpret a "HOST/BITS" IP mask specification. (Ex. 192.168.1.64/28)
00420                           name_sock,    // name file for the listening socket
00421                           IP_address;   // IP address of this server
00422 
00423         static int port,                                // the port number to bind to
00424                                   cgi_timeout,          // the time-out value in seconds for read output cgi process
00425                                   log_file_sz,          // memory size for file log
00426                                   verify_mode,          // mode of verification ssl connection
00427                                   max_Keep_Alive,       // Specifies the maximum number of requests that can be served through a Keep-Alive (Persistent) session
00428                                   num_connection;

00485 
00486 template <class Socket> class U_EXPORT UServer : public UServer_Base {
00487 public:
00488 
00489         UServer(UFileConfig* cfg) : UServer_Base(cfg)
00490                 {
00491                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UServer, "%p", cfg)
00492 
00493                 socket =                                                U_NEW(Socket(UClientImage_Base::bIPv6));
00494                 UClientImage_Base::init(U_NEW(Socket(UClientImage_Base::bIPv6)));
00495                 }
00496 
00497         virtual ~UServer()
00498                 {
00499                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UServer)
00500                 }
00501 
00502         static Socket* getSocket() { return (Socket*) pthis->socket; }
00503 
00504         // MANAGE ALL...
00505 
00506         void go()
00507                 {
00508                 U_TRACE(0, "UServer::go()")
00509 
00510                 UServer_Base::run(); // loop waiting for connection
00511                 }
00512 
00513         // DEBUG
00514 
00515 #ifdef DEBUG
00516         const char* dump(bool reset) const { return UServer_Base::dump(reset); }
00517 #endif
00518 
00519 protected:
00520 
00521         // method VIRTUAL to redefine
00522 
00528         virtual void newClientImage()
00529                 {
00530                 U_TRACE(0, "UServer::newClientImage()")
00531 
00532 #       ifdef DEBUG
00533                 UClientImage_Base* pClientImage = U_NEW(UClientImage<Socket>);
00534 
00535                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(pClientImage, UClientImage_Base::pClientImage)
00536 #       else
00537                 (void) U_NEW(UClientImage<Socket>);
00538 #       endif
00539                 }
00540 
00541 private:
00542         UServer(const UServer&) : UServer_Base(0) {}
00543         UServer& operator=(const UServer&)                      { return *this; }
00544 };
00545 
00546 #ifdef HAVE_SSL // specializzazione con USSLSocket
00547 
00548 template <> class U_EXPORT UServer<USSLSocket> : public UServer_Base {
00549 public:
00550 
00551         UServer(UFileConfig* cfg) : UServer_Base(cfg)
00552                 {
00553                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UServer<USSLSocket>, "%p", cfg)
00554 
00555                 USSLSocket::method        = (SSL_METHOD*) SSLv23_server_method();
00556                 USocket::accept4_flags = 0;
00557 
00558                 socket =                                                U_NEW(USSLSocket(UClientImage_Base::bIPv6));
00559                 UClientImage_Base::init(U_NEW(USSLSocket(UClientImage_Base::bIPv6, getSocket()->ctx)));
00560                 }
00561 
00562         virtual ~UServer()
00563                 {
00564                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UServer<USSLSocket>)
00565                 }
00566 
00567         // SERVICES
00568 
00569         static USSLSocket* getSocket() { return (USSLSocket*) pthis->socket; }
00570 
00571         // MANAGE ALL...
00572 
00573         void go()
00574                 {
00575                 U_TRACE(0, "UServer<USSLSocket>::go()")
00576 
00577                 USSLSocket* sslsocket = getSocket();
00578 
00579                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(sslsocket->isSSL(), true)
00580                 
00581                 // These are the 1024 bit DH parameters from "Assigned Number for SKIP Protocols"
00582                 // (http://www.skip-vpn.org/spec/numbers.html).
00583                 // See there for how they were generated.
00584 
00585                 sslsocket->useDHFile();
00586 
00587                 // Load our certificate
00588 
00589                 if (sslsocket->setContext(cert_file.c_str(), key_file.c_str(), password.c_str(),
00590                                                                                          ca_file.c_str(),  ca_path.c_str(), verify_mode) == false)
00591                         {
00592                         U_ERROR("SSL setContext() failed...", 0);
00593                         }
00594 
00595                 UServer_Base::run(); // loop waiting for connection
00596                 }
00597 
00598         // DEBUG
00599 
00600 #ifdef DEBUG
00601         const char* dump(bool reset) const { return UServer_Base::dump(reset); }
00602 #endif
00603 
00604 protected:
00605 
00606         // method VIRTUAL to redefine
00607 
00613         virtual void newClientImage()
00614                 {
00615                 U_TRACE(0, "UServer<USSLSocket>::newClientImage()")
00616 
00617 #       ifdef DEBUG
00618                 UClientImage_Base* pClientImage = U_NEW(UClientImage<USSLSocket>);
00619 
00620                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(pClientImage, UClientImage_Base::pClientImage)
00621 #       else
00622                 (void) U_NEW(UClientImage<USSLSocket>);
00623 #       endif
00624                 }
00625 
00626 private:
00627         UServer<USSLSocket>(const UServer<USSLSocket>&) : UServer_Base(0) {}
00628         UServer<USSLSocket>& operator=(const UServer<USSLSocket>&)                 { return *this; }
00629 };

00631 #endif
